description:
The Straw Hats bid a tearful farewell to the brave little ship that was their home for so very many adventures. Rest in peace, Merry!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arigatou Merry! Yuki ni Keburu Wakare no Umi
Merci pour tout Merry ! Adieux sur une mer enneigée
Thank You, Merry! Snow Falls over the Parting Sea
Спасибо, Мерри! Снег на море прощания
شكرًا لك يا ميري! يتساقط الثّلج على بحر الفراق!
ありがとうメリー! 雪に煙る別れの海
